subject: Ears and Hearing
Officiating (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
organizations: Journal of Occupational and Environmental Hygiene
lead_paragraph: A study found referees were more likely to report symptoms of ringing in the ears and trouble hearing than people of the same age in the general population.
snippet: A study found referees were more likely to report symptoms of ringing in the ears and trouble hearing than people of the same age in the general population.
